entry.string: The Newsletter module allows an individual or organization to compile and distribute news and research updates to interested parties via email. This module gives writers, editors and publishers a comprehensive process to easily assemble the stories for an newsletter and subsequently publish the information to a subscription base.
entry.translation: Zee Noosletter mudoole-a elloos un indeefidooel oor oorguneezeshun tu cumpeele-a und deestriboote-a noos und reseerch updetes tu interested perteees feea imeeel. Thees mudoole-a geefes vreeters, ideeturs und poobleeshers a cumprehenseefe-a prucess tu ieseely essemble-a zee stureees fur un noosletter und soobseqooently poobleesh zee inffurmeshun tu a soobscreepshun bese-a.

entry.string: Note:  If you have not yet configured the module, please do so.
entry.translation: Nute-a:  Iff yuoo hefe-a nut yet cunffeegoored zee mudoole-a, pleese-a du su.

entry.string: As a user of the Newsletter module, you will be added to either the publisher, editor or writer group. Once the module administrator has added you to one of these groups, you will be able to create content for a publication.
entry.translation: Es a user ooff zee Noosletter mudoole-a, yuoo veell be-a edded tu ieezeer zee poobleesher, ideetur oor vreeter gruoop. Oonce-a zee mudoole-a edmeenistretur hes edded yuoo tu oone-a ooff zeese-a gruoops, yuoo veell be-a eble-a tu creete-a cuntent fur a poobleeceshun.

entry.string: A publication is the top-level wrapper for each issue and sets default information for each issue and story within the issue.
entry.translation: A poobleeceshun is zee tup-lefel vrepper fur iech issooe-a und sets deffoolt inffurmeshun fur iech issooe-a und stury veethin zee issooe-a.

entry.string: A publication will contain the following items:
entry.translation: A poobleeceshun veell cunteeen zee fullooeeng items:

entry.string: Each publication should have a disclaimer or confidentiality clause. Once a disclaimer is created, it can be used by multiple publications.
entry.translation: Eech poobleeceshun shuoold hefe-a a deescleimer oor cunffeedentielity cloose-a. Oonce-a a deescleimer is creeted, it cun be-a used by moolteeple-a poobleeceshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: An issue contains the news and research updates that have been compiled as stories. Once the issue is ready to be published, the issue will be sent to the subscription base. After an issue has been published, it can be view by non-registered users from the Newsletter information block.
entry.translation: Un issooe-a cunteeens zee noos und reseerch updetes thet hefe-a beee cumpeeled es stureees. Oonce-a zee issooe-a is reedy tu be-a poobleeshed, zee issooe-a veell be-a sent tu zee soobscreepshun bese-a. Effter un issooe-a hes beee poobleeshed, it cun be-a feeoo by nun-regeestered users frum zee Noosletter inffurmeshun bluck.

entry.string: Each issue will have multiple stories relating to the news and research updates that will be presented to the subscription base.
entry.translation: Eech issooe-a veell hefe-a moolteeple-a stureees releteeng tu zee noos und reseerch updetes thet veell be-a presented tu zee soobscreepshun bese-a.

entry.string: The following is an example of a publication:
entry.translation: Zee fullooeeng is un ixemple-a ooff a poobleeceshun:

entry.string: County Asked to Increase Homeless Aid
entry.translation: Cuoonty Esked tu Increese-a Humeless Eeed

entry.string: Steps to publish your first issue:
entry.translation: Steps tu poobleesh yuoor furst issooe-a:

entry.string: The admin or publisher should first update the module's configuration within the Newsletter modify configuration before publishing an issue. If the Newsletter information block has been added, then the Publisher or Company Name and Information fields will be displayed within the information block. Information should contain a general description about the publications that are available to the subscription base.
entry.translation: Zee edmeen oor poobleesher shuoold furst updete-a zee mudoole's cunffeegooreshun veethin zee Noosletter mudiffy cunffeegooreshun beffure-a poobleeshing un issooe-a. Iff zee Noosletter inffurmeshun bluck hes beee edded, zeen zee Pooblisher oor Cumpuny Neme-a und Inffurmeshun feeelds veell be-a deespleyed veethin zee inffurmeshun bluck. Inffurmeshun shuoold cunteeen a generel descreepshun ebuoot zee poobleeceshuns thet ere-a efeeeleble-a tu zee soobscreepshun bese-a.

entry.string: Add a signature block if you wish to include a signature in each issue. Do not include a user name in your signature block as this will be automatically included in the template. By default, the signature block will be displayed after your user name.
entry.translation: Edd a seegnetoore-a bluck iff yuoo veesh tu incloode-a a seegnetoore-a in iech issooe-a. Du nut incloode-a a user neme-a in yuoor seegnetoore-a bluck es thees veell be-a ootumeteecelly inclooded in zee templete-a. By deffoolt, zee seegnetoore-a bluck veell be-a deespleyed effter yuoor user neme-a.

entry.string: Each publication can have it's own HTML and text email template. To create a new template, you will need to copy one of the existing templates and modify the template for the desired appearance. A README file is included in the templates directory with the necessary information on creating a new template.
entry.translation: Eech poobleeceshun cun hefe-a it's oovn HTML und text imeeel templete-a. Tu creete-a a noo templete-a, yuoo veell need tu cupy oone-a ooff zee ixeesting templetes und mudeeffy zee templete-a fur zee desured eppeerunce-a. A REEDME feele-a is inclooded in zee templetes durectury veet zee necessery inffurmeshun oon creeteeng a noo templete-a.

entry.string: The default templates are located the directory "modules/newsletter/templates"
entry.translation: Zee deffoolt templetes ere-a luceted zee durectury "modules/newsletter/templates"

entry.string: Once a new template has been created, assign this template when you create the publication. When previewing an issue, the HTML publication template will be used to display the issue.
entry.translation: Once-a a noo templete-a hes beee creeted, esseegn thees templete-a vhee yuoo creete-a zee poobleeceshun. Vhee prefeeooing un issooe-a, zee HTML poobleeceshun templete-a veell be-a used tu deespley zee issooe-a.

entry.string: Select "Publish Issue" from the Newsletter user menu.
entry.translation: Select "Poobleesh Issooe-a" frum zee Noosletter user menu. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Either create a new publication or choose a publication that already exists. (publisher)
entry.translation: Eeezeer creete-a a noo poobleeceshun oor chuuse-a a poobleeceshun thet elreedy ixeests. (poobleesher)

entry.string: You can continue adding stories to the issue until you have finished and are ready to publish the issue.
entry.translation: Yuoo cun cunteenooe-a eddeeng stureees tu zee issooe-a unteel yuoo hefe-a feenished und ere-a reedy tu poobleesh zee issooe-a.

entry.string: Select an issue to preview. The publication's HTML template will be used to display the issue.
entry.translation: Select un issooe-a tu prefeeoo. Zee poobleeceshun's HTML templete-a veell be-a used tu deespley zee issooe-a.

entry.string: Select an issue to publish. The issue will be sent to the subscription base. After an issue has been published, it is viewable to non-registered users from within the Newsletter information block as an archive of past issues.
entry.translation: Select un issooe-a tu poobleesh. Zee issooe-a veell be-a sent tu zee soobscreepshun bese-a. Effter un issooe-a hes beee poobleeshed, it is feeooeble-a tu nun-regeestered users frum veethin zee Noosletter inffurmeshun bluck es un ercheefe-a ooff pest issooes.

entry.string: To publish another issue, repeat steps 4-8.
entry.translation: Tu poobleesh unuzeer issooe-a, repeet steps 4-8.

entry.string: Normally, a user cannot subscribe to a publication unless they are a registered user on your site. If the Newsletter information block has been added, then a registered user will be able to subscribe to a publication and modify their subscriptions.
entry.translation: Nurmelly, a user cunnut soobscreebe-a tu a poobleeceshun unless zeey ere-a a regeestered user oon yuoor seete-a. Iff zee Noosletter inffurmeshun bluck hes beee edded, zeen a regeestered user veell be-a eble-a tu soobscreebe-a tu a poobleeceshun und mudeeffy zeeur soobscreepshuns. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: If you wish to add a subscription that is not a registered user, then you can add a subscription from the add subscription menu. You will need to provide a user name and email address. This provides an alternative way of adding subscriptions to a publication for users that are not registered.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo veesh tu edd a soobscreepshun thet is nut a regeestered user, zeen yuoo cun edd a soobscreepshun frum zee edd soobscreepshun menu. Yuoo veell need tu prufeede-a a user neme-a und imeeel eddress. Thees prufeedes un elterneteefe-a vey ooff eddeeng soobscreepshuns tu a poobleeceshun fur users thet ere-a nut regeestered. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: From the main menu, you have the following choices based on your privileges:
entry.translation: Frum zee meeen menoo, yuoo hefe-a zee fullooeeng chueeces besed oon yuoor preefileges:

entry.string: Publish Issue - Create a new issue for publication
entry.translation: Poobleesh Issooe-a - Creete-a a noo issooe-a fur poobleeceshun

entry.string: Edit Issues - Edit your publications, issues, stories, disclaimers and signature block.
entry.translation: Edeet Issooes - Ideet yuoor poobleeceshuns, issooes, stureees, deescleimers und seegnetoore-a bluck.

entry.string: Edit Subscriptions - Search, add and edit subscriptions of a publication.
entry.translation: Edeet Soobscreepshuns - Seerch, edd und ideet soobscreepshuns ooff a poobleeceshun.

entry.string: Modify Config - Administrative menu to modify the module configuration.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeeg - Edmeenistretife-a menoo tu mudeeffy zee mudoole-a cunffeegooreshun.

entry.string: The owner of the publication usually assigned to the publication group.
entry.translation: Zee oovner ooff zee poobleeceshun usooelly esseegned tu zee poobleeceshun gruoop.

entry.string: The category for the publication. This will be a category created by the module administrator.
entry.translation: Zee cetegury fur zee poobleeceshun. Thees veell be-a a cetegury creeted by zee mudoole-a edmeenistretur.

entry.string: Alternative categories allow a module developer to find publications based on other categories. For example, a module developer could create a subscription block based on an article category, assign the publication's alternative category to that article category and show publication information when that article is displayed.
entry.translation: Elterneteefe-a cetegureees elloo a mudoole-a defeluper tu feend poobleeceshuns besed oon oozeer cetegureees. Fur ixemple-a, a mudoole-a defeluper cuoold creete-a a soobscreepshun bluck besed oon un erteecle-a cetegury, esseegn zee poobleeceshun's elterneteefe-a cetegury tu thet erteecle-a cetegury und shoo poobleeceshun inffurmeshun vhee thet erteecle-a is deespleyed. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The title of the publication. This will be included in the email header.
entry.translation: Zee teetle-a ooff zee poobleeceshun. Thees veell be-a inclooded in zee imeeel heeder.

entry.string: The introduction to the publication. The introduction can include a general greeting message, overview of the publication, etc.
entry.translation: Zee intrudoocshun tu zee poobleeceshun. Zee intrudoocshun cun incloode-a a generel greeteeng messege-a, ooferfeeoo ooff zee poobleeceshun, itc.

entry.string: The name of the HTML template to use for the publication. The HTML template located in the modules/newsletter/templates directory.
entry.translation: Zee neme-a ooff zee HTML templete-a tu use-a fur zee poobleeceshun. Zee HTML templete-a luceted in zee mudooles/noosletter/templetes durectury.

entry.string: The name of the text template to use for the publication. The text template located in the modules/newsletter/templates directory.
entry.translation: Zee neme-a ooff zee text templete-a tu use-a fur zee poobleeceshun. Zee text templete-a luceted in zee modules/newsletter/templates durectury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The subject line of the publication email.
entry.translation: Zee soobject leene-a ooff zee poobleeceshun imeeel.

entry.string: The logo of the publication. This is only included in HTML mail. The logo must be an http link to the image.
entry.translation: Zee lugu ooff zee poobleeceshun. Thees is oonly inclooded in HTML meeel. Zee lugu moost be-a un http leenk tu zee imege-a.

entry.string: The default number of days before a link expires in a story. This value can be overridden within each story.
entry.translation: Zee deffoolt noomber ooff deys beffure-a a leenk ixpures in a stury. Thees felooe-a cun be-a ooferreeddee veethin iech stury.

entry.string: If a link to a piece of content requires registration before you can view the content, this text will be displayed after the link.
entry.translation: Iff a leenk tu a peeece-a ooff cuntent reqooures regeestreshun beffure-a yuoo cun feeoo zee cuntent, thees text veell be-a deespleyed effter zee leenk.

entry.string: If the publication is private, then registered users will not be allowed to subscribe to the publication. The publisher of the publication will need to add subscribers through the "Edit Subscriptions" menu.
entry.translation: Iff zee poobleeceshun is preefete-a, zeen regeestered users veell nut be-a ellooed tu soobscreebe-a tu zee poobleeceshun. Zee poobleesher ooff zee poobleeceshun veell need tu edd soobscreebers thruoogh zee "Edeet Soobscreepshuns" menu.

entry.string: The disclaimer or confidentiality clause of a publication.
entry.translation: Zee deescleimer oor cunffeedentielity cloose-a ooff a poobleeceshun.

entry.string: The description of the publication is displayed when a registered user chooses to subscribe to a publication or modify their subscription through the Newsletter information block.
entry.translation: Zee descreepshun ooff zee poobleeceshun is deespleyed vhee a regeestered user chuuses tu soobscreebe-a tu a poobleeceshun oor mudeeffy zeeur soobscreepshun thruoogh zee Noosletter inffurmeshun bluck.

entry.string: The title of the issue. This will be appended to the publication name in the email header.
entry.translation: Zee teetle-a ooff zee issooe-a. Thees veell be-a eppended tu zee poobleeceshun neme-a in zee imeeel heeder. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Allow an issue to be shown in the archive of past issues. The archive is displayed to registered users in the information block.
entry.translation: Elloo un issooe-a tu be-a shoon in zee ercheefe-a ooff pest issooes. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Zee ercheefe-a is deespleyed tu regeestered users in zee inffurmeshun bluck.

entry.string: The date that the issue was published. To publish the issue again, clear the date fields or set the fields to "0".
entry.translation: Zee dete-a thet zee issooe-a ves poobleeshed. Tu poobleesh zee issooe-a egeeen, cleer zee dete-a feeelds oor set zee feeelds tu "0".

entry.string: The category of the story. The story order within an issue is based on the category order. Within each category, the story is ordered by date (newest to oldest).
entry.translation: Zee cetegury ooff zee stury. Zee stury oorder veethin un issooe-a is besed oon zee cetegury oorder. Veethin iech cetegury, zee stury is oordered by dete-a (nooest tu ooldest).

entry.string: The source of the story (e.g. The New York Times).
entry.translation: Zee suoorce-a ooff zee stury (i.g. Zee Noo Yurk Teemes).

entry.string: If the content piece does not have a date, then the alternative date field can be used in place of the date field. If the story date is also included, then the alternative date is appended to the date field.
entry.translation: Iff zee cuntent peeece-a dues nut hefe-a a dete-a, zeen zee elterneteefe-a dete-a feeeld cun be-a used in plece-a ooff zee dete-a feeeld. Iff zee stury dete-a is elsu inclooded, zeen zee elterneteefe-a dete-a is eppended tu zee dete-a feeeld.
Zee cuntent ooff zee stury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The full URL to the content piece.
entry.translation: Zee fooll URL tu zee cuntent peeece-a.

entry.string: This field is provided if a link requires registration before viewing.
entry.translation: Thees feeeld is prufeeded iff a leenk reqooures regeestreshun beffure-a feeooing.

entry.string: The default number of days before the link expires for the content piece. Some news links expire after a certain number of days. This will override the publication setting for link expiration. To specify that a link never expires, set this value to 0.
entry.translation: Zee deffoolt noomber ooff deys beffure-a zee leenk ixpures fur zee cuntent peeece-a. Sume-a noos leenks ixpure-a effter a certeeen noomber ooff deys. Thees veell ooferreede-a zee poobleeceshun setteeng fur leenk ixpureshun. Tu speceeffy thet a leenk nefer ixpures, set thees felooe-a tu 0.
Cummentery ebuoot zee cuntent. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: The source of the commentary (e.g. person, news agency, etc.).
entry.translation: Zee suoorce-a ooff zee cummentery (i.g. persun, noos egency, itc.).
